mapper.select: SELECT cart.id AS id, cart.product_count AS product_count, product.price AS price, product.product_name AS product_name, product.image_full_path AS image_full_path, (cart.product_count * product.price) AS subtotal, cart.created_at AS created_at, cart.updated_at AS updated_at FROM tbl_cart AS cart JOIN mst_product AS product ON cart.product_id = product.id WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY updated_at DESC, created_at DESC;
